name: 4 jumping points for games
description:
Theres 4 ideas for some simple games

walls experiment

an attempt at making a player stay on a ball (similar to mario galaxy)

a platformer where the world spawns around you and you must clear pieces of the world to escape or progress...i didn't get that far...probably the coolest of the 4 things

and a very basic platformer where the color of the background changes based on a ball hitting the walls or the player...nothing too special...

Have fun with the code.  I hope someone can use this to make something really cool.  You can reuse my artwork, that I obviously spent days and days perfecting(sarcasm)...I mean, look at that screenshot...amazing(still sarcasm)...(those aren't screenshots, they are images used in-game)

You can reuse the code also.  This code was written in 1 day, so expect some bugs.
